data.title: Welcome to Citrus County
data.text: A PERMIT APPLICATION Required for all permits B OWNER-BUILDER AFFIDAVIT If property owner is acting as contractor C PROOF OF OWNERSHIP For title / deed / Property Appraiser's website information D NOTICE OF COMMENCEMENT If work value is over $5,000 ($15,000 for A/C) E SITE PLAN For all new structures or area increase F SURVEY /SPOT ELEVATION LETTER To verify ground elevation in SFHA G ENGINEERED STORMWATER PLAN For new structures on waterfront lot (verify with Stormwater) H ENGINEERED CONSTRUCTION DRAWINGS I DBPR APPROVED ENGINEERED PLANS For all DBPR modular buildings, sheds, etc. J TRUSS LAYOUT W/ REACTION SUMMARY K PRODUCT APPROVAL FORM To list product approval information for windows, doors, shingles, underlayment, etc. L ENERGY EFFICIENCY CALCULATIONS If space was previously unconditioned M HEAT LOSS AND GAIN CALCULATIONS (MANUAL J) If space was previously unconditioned N AHRI PRODUCT PERFORMANCE CERTIFICATE For A/C equipment change-outs/upgrades O DUCT LAYOUT For all new ductwork systems/extensions P TREE PRESERVATON AFFIDAVIT For all new structures Q SEPTIC SYSTEM PERMIT For projects involving septic systems R UTILITIES APPLICATION For projects connecting to County utilities S RIGHT OF WAY AFFIDAVIT For projects impacting County right of way T FINISHED FLOOR ELEVATION AFFIDAVIT For all new dwellings: SFR, M/H, Duplex, etc. U SLAB ELEVATION WAVIER REQUEST If slab <12" above crown of ROW (must include a lot drainage plan) V MOBILE HOME FLOOR PLAN W BLOCKING AND TIE DOWN LAYOUT X MOBILE HOME INSTALLATION SPECS Y ENGINEERED MODULAR FOUNDATION PLAN For modular buildings (must be a "permanent foundation") Z ENGINEERED FOUNDATION CERTIFICATION LETTER To certify adequate foundation design in SFHA AA ELECTRICAL RECONNECTION REQUEST When requesting that power be reconnected to an existing structure BB POOL SAGETY BARRIER AFFIDAVIT CC POOL FLOW CALCULATIONS For pool plumbing, include Total Dynamic Head DD POOL LAYOUT DRAWING EE VINYL/ACRYLIC WINDOW AFFIDAVIT FF ELECTRICAL RISER DIAGRAM Should already be included in engineered plans for homes GG ELECTRICAL LOAD CALCULATIONS For new construction or adding electrical load to existing service HH FLOOR PLAN (TRADES) LAYOUT II PLUMBING DWV/GAS ISOMETRIC DIAGRAM For new DWV systems or new gas systems (provide BTU needs of each gas appliance) JJ JURISDICTIONAL WETLANDS DELINEATION To verify setbacks from wetlands KK MEAN HIGH-WATER DELINEATION To verify setbacks from mean high-water LL MINING NOTICE FORM For projects within a half mile of active mining operations MM MANUFACTURER'S EQUIPMENT SPECIFICATIONS For fireplaces, generators, ATS, manual lockouts, elevators/lifts, AG pools, etc. NN LIFE SAFETY PLAN For new commercial buildings, renovations, remodels, etc. OO FIRE FLOW CALCULATIONS For new commercial buildings and additions PP GEOTECHNICAL REPORT For all ground/foundation remediation, structures on questionable soils, etc. QQ RF NON-INTERFERENCE LETTER For new RF transmission antennas and/or towers (Engineering Division certifies non-interference) RR UNITY OF TITLE For use when building is on more than one parcel SS ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACT STUDY Required when site development will impact protected lands, flora, or fauna TT SKETCH/CONFIGURATION LAYOUT OF STRUCTURE To clarify structure configuration/layout, structure features/amenities/trades
